uk.ac.gate.cloud.job

Class InputDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.gate.cloud.common.ApiObject
      • uk.ac.gate.cloud.job.InputSummary
        • uk.ac.gate.cloud.job.InputDetails

  • public class InputDetails
extends InputSummary
    A single input specification for an annotation job. One job can (and usually will) have many inputs.
    Author:
    Ian Roberts

    • Field Detail

      • encoding

        public String encoding
        Character encoding to use when reading entries from the archive. If null, the (W)ARC entry headers will be used to guess an appropriate encoding for each entry (in the case of ARC or WARC files) or a default of UTF-8 will be used (for other formats).

      • mimeTypeOverride

        public String mimeTypeOverride
        MIME type to use when parsing entries from the archive. If null the appropriate type will be guessed based on the file name extension and (in the case of (W)ARC files) the HTTP headers from the (W)ARC entry.

      • fileExtensions

        public String fileExtensions
        Comma-separated list of file extensions that will be processed. Entries that do not match any of these extensions will be ignored. If null all entries that represent files (as opposed to directories) will be processed. Should be left as null for streaming input types, and will always be null for (W)ARC inputs.

      • mimeTypes

        public String mimeTypes
        Space-separated list of MIME types used to filter the entries of interest from ARC and WARC input files. Entries whose MIME type does not match any of these will be ignored. Will be null for non-(W)ARC inputs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InputDetails

        public InputDetails()

    • Method Detail

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Refresh this input's state from the server.

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Delete this input specification.
